original_title: Fit to Be Tied: Alexis Ford
overview: Blonde, beautiful Alexis Ford is all tied up and at your mercy! Bound and restrained, she gives in to her most primal desires of the flesh! Joined by a decadent cast of submissive girlfriends who enjoy the thrill of ropes and dressing up in sexy lingerie, they explore sex swings, spreader bars, Japanese rope binding, kinky bondage and intense sex. Alexis Ford is definitely Fit to Be Tied!
title: Fit to Be Tied: Alexis Ford
